summary.para: Contains information passed to a WH_CBT hook procedure, CBTProc, before a window is created.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The winuser.h header defines CBT_CREATEWND as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

summary.para: A pointer to a structure that contains initialization parameters for the window about to be created.
A handle to the window whose position in the Z order precedes that of the window being created. This member can also be NULL.
